name: Matt Toland
background_summary: Matt Toland is a Data Scientist with a background in Mechanical Engineering (MEng, Queen's University Belfast) and a specialized PGDip in Big Data Analytics & Artificial Intelligence (First Class, Atlantic Technological University). His career began at Accenture, where he progressed from Data Engineering Analyst to Data Science Consultant over approximately 3.5 years. He then joined FLIGHTSTORY as a Data Scientist and was promoted to Senior Data Scientist within 10 months, indicating strong performance and rapid growth within the company.

previous_companies.description: Progressed from Data Engineering Analyst to Data Science Consultant
Promoted to Senior Data Scientist within 10 months, indicating strong performance and rapid growth

public_speaking_or_content.title: My work got featured in The Sunday Times

investment_criteria_assessment.assessment_summary: Matt Toland has a strong background in data science and AI, with relevant experience at Accenture and FLIGHTSTORY. He has developed impactful tools that have been recognized, demonstrating his ability to create compelling solutions to real-world problems in the media and creator economy space. While he has not founded a company before, his educational achievements, rapid career progression, and thought leadership suggest he has the intelligence and strategic capability to be a successful founder. Overall, he appears to be a strong candidate that aligns well with Flight Story's investment criteria.
